settings.label: Layout
settings.info: The default layout is structured based on the "Product Detail" page.

settings.label: Enable color swatches for variant color

options.label: Full-width add to cart with price

settings.label: Enable custom font size for heading
Description
settings.info: Create metafield descriptors.subtitle or use default description from admin.

settings.label: Color swatches rules
settings.info: Format: <Color option>: <value>(separated by lines). The color name must match the variant color option name. Example: Rose Gold: #b76e79 [Learn more about color swatches.](https://docs.muup.co/article/481-color-swatches)

settings.label: Color variant name
settings.info: Add here color variant names, separated by comma.

settings.label: Color picker
settings.info: You can select a color here and paste it into the field above.

settings.label: Add icon to replace the "Remove" button
Preloader style
settings.info: Each preloader style has unique options below.
This style consists of two parts: logo or store name with a progress bar and animated images.

settings.label: Preloader logo image
settings.info: This image would be disabled if used preloader text option.

settings.label: Show animated images
settings.info: Show animated images on the first site loading or every time.

settings.label: Preloader prefix
settings.info: This prefix will be visible before the progress counter.

settings.label: Preloader counted text
settings.info: This word will be listed during loading progress counted.
